pageContext.geocode_address: 25040 Stewart Street, Loma Linda University School of Dentistry, Loma Linda, CA 92354, USA
pageContext.course_type_long_description: LEGO® Super Heroes need your help to defeat the destructive forces of evil arch-villains as they threaten LEGOpolis!  Explore the tools and techniques of your favorite caped crusaders and learn what makes them not only Super Heroes, but super engineers.  An engineering curriculum designed by Play-Well challenges heroes to design, build, and save a city where ingenuity and imagination can solve any conflict.
pageContext.course_type_name: Super Hero Master Engineering using LEGO® Materials
